params.dx: the amount of tokens the user wants to sell. If the token charges                          a fee on transfers, use the amount that gets transferred after the fee.
params.tokenIndexFrom: the token the user wants to sell
params.tokenIndexTo: the token the user wants to buy

returns.amountOut: amount of tokens the user will receive

returns.token: address of the token at given index

params.deadline: latest timestamp to accept this transaction
params.dx: the amount of tokens the user wants to swap from
params.minDy: the min amount the user would like to receive, or revert.
params.tokenIndexFrom: the token the user wants to swap from
params.tokenIndexTo: the token the user wants to swap to

userdoc.notice: Contract mimicking Saddle swap interface to connect following pools: - Synapse    nUSD/NOTE - CantoDex   NOTE/USDC - CantoDex   NOTE/USDT Swaps between "disconnected" coins are routed through NOTE.
